law.catch_line: Permit to discharge pollutants into waters -- Fees.

text.section: As used in this section, "cabinet" shall mean the Energy and Environment Cabinet.
An applicant for a permit to discharge pollutants into waters of the Commonwealth shall be subject to a filing fee by the cabinet in the amount of twenty percent (20%) of the discharge permit fee.
The cabinet may impose the maximum fee if a discharge falls into multiple categories.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 379, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 471, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990.
